There isn't a sense of him connecting with his own behavior and own conscience at a level that most people can understand. So, while football fans and animal lovers continue to judge Michael Vick on very different scales, the dogs in Utah keep taking two steps forward and one step back. Microsoft's Server and Tools Business-in many ways the epicenter of its cloud strategy-is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of longtime division president Bob Muglia . While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer href="http://www.eweek.com/c/a/c/a/Windows/Apple-App-Store-Fight-Bob Muglia-Departure-Marked-Microsoft-Week-801641/"> wrote in a Jan. 10 email to employees announcing Bob Muglia 's removal.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing.
